text:
Questrecques is a French commune in the region Nord-Pas-de-Calais, in the Pas-de-Calais department in north France.
Questrecques is 7 miles (11 km) southeast of Boulogne-sur-Mer. It is on the riverbanks of the River Liane.
The number of people living in Questrecques goes up most years.
In France, there is a big survey called a census. In the census, the government finds out how many people live in a place.
There is a church in Questrecques. It is called The Church of St. Martin. It is a 15th century church.
